entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is introduced as the Minister of Magic who looks angrier than Harry has ever seen him. He is described as roared and blustered.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: McGonagall is introduced as a professor who screams and points at Fudge, trembling all over. She struggles to find words to describe what had happened.

entities.name: crouch
entities.description: Crouch is mentioned as the person who was attacked by the dementor. He is described as worse than dead after being administered its fatal kiss.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is introduced as a professor who speaks to Fudge in a calm manner.
